_header: I would witen of some wise wight / Witterly what this world were
Title(s): This World Fareth as a ffantasy
Subjects: transitoriness, of world; Worthies, Nine; death; scripture, paraphrases of
_description: ‘This World Fareþ as a ffantasy’, based on Ecclesiastes — eleven 12-line stanzas with refrain, ‘ffor þis world fareþ as a fantasye’

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
I wolde witen of sum wys wihtWitterly what þis world
                    were…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And her we stunteþ but a stoundeffor þis world is
                    but fantasye

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
I Wolde wolde witen of sume wis wihtWitterly what þis world
                    were…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And here we stunteþ but a stoundeffor þis world is
                    but ffantasye
